TopicTitle: Is it possible to make a planet the center of the universe?

Articles.Content: Ya. I'm going there. I'm trying to make a mod based on the Geocentric model of the universe but I need to make Kerbin the center and move the sun. Do I just mess with their .cfg's? I'm using Kopernicus
There was a mod that did something similar, but it wasn't updated for 1.1. Here's the link. So, the answer is probably yes, but I'm not sure.
